ValidationRule.description: Values in the fields are not allowed to add when the call status is RNR, Busy, Person not available, Not Reachable and Wrong/Invalid Number.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR(ISPICKVAL( Call_Status__c , 'RNR'),ISPICKVAL( Call_Status__c , 'Person not available'),ISPICKVAL( Call_Status__c , 'Busy'),ISPICKVAL( Call_Status__c , 'Wrong/Invalid Number'),ISPICKVAL( Call_Status__c , 'Not Reachable')), OR(Call_Center_Remarks__c != '' , Verified__c = TRUE , NOT(ISBLANK( Verification_Status__c )) , NOT(ISBLANK(Suggestion__c)) , NOT( ISBLANK(Complaints__c )) , NOT( ISPICKVAL( How_was_the_Promotion__c , '')) , Did_you_receive_any_gifts__c = True , Would_you_Consider_Purchasing_from_us__c = True , Remarks__c != '' , Type1__c != '' , Manager_Email__c != '' , NOT( ISPICKVAL( Type_of_Promotion_Member__c , '')) , NOT( ISPICKVAL( Product__c , '')) , NOT( ISPICKVAL( Availability__c , '')) , NOT( ISPICKVAL( Service_Support__c , '')) , NOT( ISPICKVAL( Branding__c , '')) , Please_give_suggestion_for_improvement__c != '' , How_did_you_like_Ashirvad_till_now__c != ''))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please do not enter any details when the Call Status is RNR, Busy, Not Reachable, Person not available or Wrong/Invalid number.
